question: IT IS SAID THAT SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY ARE MAKING PEOPLE LAZIER. DO YOU AGREE OR DISAGREE?
text: The rising scientific and technological developments leading to a lazy population. In this essay, I will explore the reasons and give examples for why I agree with this statement. To begin with, increasing usage of household appliances and other gadgets many people are becoming less enthusiastic about work and other chores which will make the adults less productive and cause illness. For Instance, communities are using more devices for unwanted work such as dishwashing and mopping robots as they are not feasible to use in our homes.
